MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers calling from the EH32 postcode area of Longniddry, affecting properties in Redcoll and surrounding areas. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:15pm to complete repairs on our equipment located near Hoprig Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3:15pm. We will make every effort to contact you if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:34pm on Wednesday, 28 October 2020
